title: Bitcoin Seesaws Back Over $29.2K, as Investors Brush Off Binance Angst; BCH, UNI, LTC Sink
description: BTC returned to its rangebound ways a day after it rose suddenly and then subsequently dropped as dramatically.

title: Binance Continues to Burn $LUNC Tokens, Removing 1.4 Billion in Latest Round
description: Leading cryptocurrency trading platform Binance has recently burned a substantial 1.4 billion tokens of the Terra Classic ecosystem ($LUNC) during its twelfth burning batch, effectively removing a large number of tokens from circulation. The cumulative amount of LUNC tokens torched by Binance is now close to the 37 billion mark, while the cryptocurrency’s community has […]

title: Robinhood’s revenue tanks by 18% in Q2
description: Robinhood, the popular trading app, has released its second-quarter results, and it comes with a mix of both positive and negative news. Despite facing a drop in revenue in the second quarter of 2023, the company achieved profitability for the first time since going public. The quarterly report, which was made public on August 2, ...
